name: Peggle One and a Half
description:
not associated with Popcap games.

oh no! bjorn tripped and fell on his magic unicorn horn, and it made a blackhole that sent all your favorite peggle pals to a primordial dimension! the only thing that survived the spaghettification was the cannon! do your best to make sense of this crazy new dimension!

i made this to test a collision handler i made for balls for game maker studio 2. i'm going to make a blog post soon with the code for it, and explaining how it works. 

time is measured in seconds. if anyone manages a time under 150 seconds i'll give you a kiss once the pandemic is over
